memberdef.name: AdditionOverflow

memberdef.name: CheckedAdd

memberdef.name: SaturatingAdd

briefdescription.para: Left bit shift with overflow checking.

parameterdescription.para: The input value to be left shifted.
The number of bits to left shift.

simplesect.para: (input * 2^shift) or nullopt if it would not fit in the return type.

briefdescription.para: Left bit shift with safe minimum and maximum values.

parameterdescription.para: The input value to be left shifted.
The number of bits to left shift.

simplesect.para: (input * 2^shift) clamped to fit between the lowest and highest representable values of the type T.
